PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-03542008-02-18HERITAGE,  ,  ,  , 
ActBroadcasting Act
PrecisAppointment of MARY McNEIL of Vancouver, British Columbia, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation to hold office during good behaviour for a term of four years, in the place of Nezhat Khosrowshahi.
